name: Phantom of Zana
storyline:
Trouble has fallen upon King Joy. The Prince, his only heir, has been kidnapped. But that's not all, The Queen has also been transformed!

The mysterious villain that is responsible for these nefarious acts was last seen heading into the wildlands of Zana.

Play as Fantastic Fania and track down this elusive agent of chaos, rescue The Prince, save The Queen and save the day!
summary: Swing, dash, slide and slice your way through this retro style 2D side scrolling platformer! Blast, hack and slash your opponents or bounce off their heads! Power up Fantastic Fania to finally confront the Phantom of Zana!
